document.full_text: the air has a distinctive pungent smell and vendors offer fried, grilled, caramelized and fresh fare at the vidalia onion festival, the annual celebration of the onion in south georgia.
document.title: georgia town celebrates vidalia onions with festival
lines_and_colors: the air has a distinctive pungent smell and vendors offer fried, grilled, caramelized and fresh fare at the vidalia onion festival, the annual celebration of the onion in south georgia.
